text: Gustaw Lutkiewicz (29 June 1924 - 24 February 2017) was a Polish actor and singer. He started his career in 1948. He was awarded the Knight's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta in 1970, the Officer's Cross in 1985 and later the Medal for Merit to Culture – Gloria Artis in 2012. He was born in Kaunas, Lithuania. Lutkiewicz died on 24 February 2017 in Warsaw, at the age of 92. ==Filmography== *1956: Nikodem Dyzma *1957: Prawdziwy koniec wielkiej wojny *1957: Ewa chce spać *1960: Walet pikowy *1961: Ludzie z pociągu *1964: Nieznany *1985: C.K.Dezerterzy *1989: Konsul *1999: Ogniem i Mieczem *2000: Syzyfowe prace ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Kaunas Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Gustaw Lutkiewicz
